project_descr: The Capacity Strengthening of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Project under the leadership of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs will strengthen the institutional and individual capacities of ministry officials to deliver this mandate.

outputs.output_descr:
Under the Zim-ASSET, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs has been allocated specific roles to promote and consolidate the economic, socio-political cooperation between Zimbabwe and other countries.

The Capacity Strengthening of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Project under the leadership of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs will strengthen the institutional and individual capacities of ministry officials to deliver this mandate. Specifically, the Project aims to deliver on the following key results: 

•	Equip Ministry of Foreign Affairs staff with diplomatic, finance and administration skills
•	Str

project_title: capacity strengthening of the min of foreign affairs
